amendment.description: To clarify the amendment relating to the grade of the Judge Advocate General of the Army.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1323 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1323 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Graham. (consideration: CR S8543-8544; text: CR S8544) To clarify the amendment relating to the grade of the Judge Advocate General of the Army.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1323 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1323 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Graham.
